metadata.notes: Merged from COMPONENTS_DATA.ods (quantities) + COMPONENTS_DATA_ENRICHED.xlsx (metadata) + 8 ordered cart items

components.name: 0.96" 128x64 OLED Display Module
components.description: 0.96-inch OLED module (commonly 128x64) using SSD1306 controller; I²C/SPI

components.name: 100W Gluegun
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: 18650 Li-ion Cells (2-cell pack)
components.description: 18650 Li-ion rechargeable cells / holder or pack (2x 18650)
components.specifications: 3.6–3.7V nominal per cell; current depends on cell model

components.name: 3.3V Linear Regulator
components.specifications: Input depends on variant; up to ~1A class (variant-dependent)

components.name: 16-bit I²C ADC
components.description: I²C ADC (ADS1115 16-bit / ADS1015 12-bit) often on breakout module

components.name: Barometric Pressure Sensor Module (BMP280)
components.description: Digital barometric pressure/temperature sensor; I²C/SPI (often on HW-611 module)

components.name: D-Sol-Wick Rma Coated
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: Different Sized Tips
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.original_name: E88 PRO DRONE ( CHEAP CHINISE 3000RS DRONE WITH BROKEN OR MALFUNCTIONING SINGLE MOTOR)
components.name: E88 Pro Drone ( Cheap Chinise 3000Rs Drone With Broken Or Malfunctioning Single Motor)
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: ESP32 DevKitC (WROOM-32D)
components.description: Wi‑Fi + BT/BLE module on DevKitC development board

components.name: ESP8266 Wi‑Fi SoC / Module
components.description: 2.4GHz Wi‑Fi SoC used in ESP‑01/ESP‑12 modules (exact module variant may vary)

components.name: Fast Recovery Diode
components.description: Fast recovery rectifier diode (approx 2A class, 1000V class depending on series)

components.name: USB to UART Converter
components.description: USB-UART bridge IC/module based on FT232RL
components.specifications: USB 5V; I/O typically 3.3V/5V tolerant (depends on board config)

components.name: NEO-6M GPS Module
components.description: GPS receiver module (NEO-6M) with UART interface

components.name: HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Distance Sensor
components.description: 40kHz ultrasonic ranging module with trigger/echo TTL interface

components.name: 4-bit Decoder IC
components.description: Remote control decoder for paired HT12E encoder; address/data pins

components.name: 4-bit Encoder IC
components.description: Remote control encoder for paired HT12D decoder; address/data pins

components.name: Digital Humidity & Temperature Sensor
components.description: I²C humidity and temperature sensor (OEM); calibrated digital output

components.name: LDR Light Sensor Module (LM393)
components.description: Light-dependent resistor module with LM393 comparator; analog + digital outputs

components.name: Vibration Sensor Module (SW-420)
components.description: Vibration/shock detection module based on SW-420 vibration switch + LM393 comparator

components.name: Capacitive Touch Sensor Module
components.description: Capacitive touch key module typically based on TTP223 touch detector IC

components.name: I²S MEMS Microphone
components.description: Digital I²S MEMS microphone module based on INMP441

components.name: N-channel MOSFET
components.description: Power MOSFET (100V) used in switching applications

components.name: N-channel MOSFET (IRFZ44N)
components.description: Logic-level-ish power MOSFET (55V) commonly used in hobby power switching

components.name: IR Speed Sensor Module (LM393)
components.description: Infrared speed/slot sensor module with LM393 comparator output

components.name: Noel Solder Flux 10Gm
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: Ra-02 LoRa Module (433MHz)
components.description: LoRa transceiver module typically based on Semtech SX1278 (410–525MHz)
components.specifications: 3.3V supply; TX current depends on output power

components.original_name: RED AND BLACK ALIGATOR CLIPS PAIRS
components.name: Red And Black Aligator Clips Pairs
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: RC522 RFID Reader Module
components.description: 13.56MHz RFID/NFC reader module based on NXP MFRC522; ISO14443A/MIFARE

components.name: SIM800L GSM/GPRS Module
components.description: Quad-band GSM/GPRS module (LGA) used on SIM800L breakout boards

components.name: Soldring Filament Wire
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: Soldron 25W
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: 30A Power Relay (5V coil)
components.description: SPST power relay, 5V coil, high-current switching (variant in SLA series)
components.specifications: Coil: 5VDC; Contacts: up to 30A @ 250VAC (per SLA series)

components.name: St-Link V2
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: STM32F4 MCU
components.description: ARM Cortex‑M4 MCU (STM32F411CEU6) typically 512KB Flash, LQFP‑48

components.name: Addressable RGB LED
components.description: Individually addressable RGB LED (NeoPixel-style); 'WS2812-16' likely 16-LED ring/strip

components.name: Zero Pcb Board
components.description: Tool / consumable / hardware item (no single standardized MPN)

components.name: Sipeed SLogic Combo 8 Logic Analyzer
components.description: The Daily Driver. 8-channel logic analyzer that decodes UART, SPI, I2C, PWM. Essential for firmware debugging.

components.name: WeAct USB-CAN Analyzer (CAN-FD)
components.description: The Automotive Must-Have. Decodes CAN bus traffic for automotive embedded projects.

components.name: SN65HVD230 CAN Transceiver Board
components.description: Connects STM32 to CAN Bus. 3.3V CAN transceiver module.

components.name: MCP2003-E/P LIN Transceiver
components.description: Connects STM32 to LIN Bus for automotive networks.

components.name: ENC28J60 Ethernet Module
components.description: For learning TCP/IP stacks. SPI-based Ethernet controller.

components.name: TXS0108E Logic Level Converter
components.description: Safety converter for 5V <-> 3.3V bidirectional level shifting.

components.name: INA219 Current Sensor Module
components.description: For measuring power consumption. I2C current/voltage sensor.

components.name: USB Digital Microscope 1000X
components.description: For inspecting solder joints, SMD components, and PCB traces.
